wikipedia_page.main: Erica James (née Sullivan; born 1960) is a British writer of several romance novels. In 2006, her novel Gardens of Delight won the Romantic Novel of the Year Award from the Romantic Novelists' Association.

response: * Gardens of Delight, 2006 book by Erica James
